legacy.full_text: For two large countries like China and the U.S., turning their back on each other is not an option. It is unrealistic for one side to remodel the other. And conflict and confrontation between them has unbearable consequences for both sides. https://t.co/MuOzqUUPX0

legacy.full_text: President Xi noted that the China-U.S. relationship - the most important bilateral relationship in the world - should be perceived & envisioned in the broad context of the accelerating global transformations unseen in a century and develop in a way that benefits our two peoples.

legacy.full_text: President Xi welcomed the orchestra to China for a tour celebrating the 50th anniversary of its first visit to China, and expressed the hope that Chinese & American artists will write a new chapter of China-U.S. cultural exchanges & people-to-people friendship.

legacy.full_text: The upcoming China-U.S. summit in San Francisco will be the first face-to-face meeting between President Xi Jinping and President Joe Biden since their Bali meeting last November.

legacy.description:
Assistant Minister of Foreign Affairs, 
Foreign Ministry Spokesperson, 
Director General, Information Department, MFA PRC. 
Get to know us more @MFA_China
legacy.name: Hua Chunying 华春莹

legacy.full_text: The two leaders will have in-depth communication on issues of strategic, overarching and fundamental importance in shaping China-U.S. relations and major issues on world peace and development.

legacy.description:

legacy.full_text: At the APEC Economic Leaders’ Meeting, President Xi Jinping will share China’s proposals for deepening Asia-Pacific cooperation and driving regional and global economic growth to contribute China’s effort to making the meeting a productive one.

legacy.full_text: At the invitation of U.S. President Joe Biden, President Xi Jinping will be in San Francisco from November 14 to 17 for a China-U.S. summit meeting and the 30th #APEC Economic Leaders’ Meeting.

legacy.description: 12th Chinese Ambassador to the United States
legacy.name: Xie Feng 谢锋

result.text: It's time to say goodbye: the #MeiXiang #TianTian & #XiaoQiJi family will return to China today. Over the past two decades, these fluffy envoys of friendship have brought joy to numerous American visitors and promoted mutual understanding and goodwill between our two peoples. Thanks go to everyone who has cared for the pandas with love. Let's wish them happiness every following day! 🐼 🐼🐼 @NationalZoo

The building of a community with a shared future in cyberspace is a natural choice in answering the call of the times&the common aspiration of intl community. https://t.co/Om8R9kjntk

legacy.name: Hua Chunying 华春莹

legacy.full_text: We advocate prioritizing development and building a more inclusive and prosperous cyberspace so that more countries and peoples can share in the benefits offered by the Internet. We advocate common security and building a more peaceful and secure cyberspace. https://t.co/NeKvdleyFv

legacy.description:

legacy.full_text: Countries’ Internet development paths and governance models should be respected. International rules on cyberspace should be observed in promoting the safe development of AI. We advocate mutual learning between civilizations and building a more equitable and inclusive cyberspace. https://t.co/5oyVAq9AJs
